body.name: LionVII Men's Nylon Work Belts - Breathable Webbing Canvas Belt with Plastic Buckle, Easy Trim to Fit 27-46" Waist
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 12 mins
features: Best Choice for Work & Travel: This military belt makes with lightweight and wear-resisting nylon material that has a strong evaporation of sweat, more comfortable and breathable, feel more flexible, EASY TO DRY IN AIR. ◆The buckle does not contain any metal components, free to pass through airport security check for travel.

High Strength 800D Nylon Strap: 100% special pure 800D nylon belt, corrosion resistance and oxidation resistance, total length is 53", strap width is 1.5",strap thickness is 2.8 mm(◆the strap twice as strong as the seat belt of the car)

International Standard YKK Buckle: Top quality plastic belt buckle made of high strength polyacetal, can withstand the weight of 150lb.(◆This non-metallic buckle for easy, quick clearance at security checkpoints.)

Fully Adjustable for Your Size: You can precisely adjust your belt to the perfect fit. Automatic Buckle,no holes in belt. ◆If the Strap is too long for you, you can trim the strap length to fit your own size. ◆This Nylon Belt Is Suitable for Pant Size Below 46inches Such as 32- 46in.
Applicable Scene: Nylon material belt,worn for four seasons,can be used with shorts /jeans/cargo trousers,ideal for outdoor work and travel. ◆Will be a nice gift for men,husband,boyfriend,father,son.
body.description: Main Product Features: Corrosion resistance, Oxidation resistance; Strong strap(twice as strong as the seat belt of the car); Evaporation of sweat,comfortable,breathable,easy dry in air; By laser cutting technology,even if used for a long time, the tail will not loosen; YKK buckle does not contain metal, it is not necessary to be removed during the airport inspection; Belt Size(Approx): Total Length(included buckle):53";Strap Width:1.5". This adjustable belt is suitable for pant size below 46inches such as 32in, 33in, 34in, 35in, 36in, 37in, 38in, 39in, 40in, 41in, 42in, 43in, 44in, 45in, 46in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and strong..no need to remove when traveling in airports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it claims
reviews.reviewText: Wore it through the TSA metal detector without issue (you’d need to remove it for the full body scanner). Felt secure enough, not quite as sturdy as a leather belt but that’s not why I bought it. You have to cut the nylon to fit your waist, but the whole process is very simple.All in all a good buy to be treated like a human going through security and not having to remove my belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good lightweight belt
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for something to replace my Uncle Mike's reinfoced instructors belt. This is not it. This belt is much lighter than I was hoping for but it is a nice lightweight belt. The plastic buckle is holding up fine also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars need a belt that won’t set off a metal detector *****
reviews.reviewText: If you are like me and you go thru metal detectors regularly and you despise having to remove your pant bet, this belt is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Value versus cost is low
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this belt seems adequate, but it's much lighter weight than my other utility belts, and the "hardware" even more so. I'm not so sure that the buckle will last, since it's so light weight and flimsy. But more importantly, the belt buckle doesn't open very wide, so it's difficult to get the belt end out when taking off your pants. I don't trust the whole rig to attach any gear, so it's just a belt now, without the utility function. I ordered this to replace a straight loop through belt made by 5.11, since I thought it would be more convenient with a quick release buckle. That isn't the case. And with the price being about 60% higher, the value just isn't there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the buckle is plastic and works great!!
reviews.reviewText: Amazingly this belt simplifies my daily uniform comfort and ease, the quick connect clamp type buckle has Not failed me at all for 9 months of daily use in maintenance attire, I have purchased 2 , I have the ability to easily choose how tight I want the belt to hold and can adjust for winter and summer uniform size without the worn out looking leather holes I had with my previous belt. Why I’m taking the time to review. I have a cordless drill and radio hanging off this belt several times for work and the buckle has to my surprise” held the weight and operated perfectly. The nylon belt strap was cut to my size and melted the end for perfect sizing. 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a simple belt assembly, a real puzzle
reviews.reviewText: Belt assembly simply fell apart when I broke the packaging and no buckle assembly diagram. Anyone successfullyassembling the buckle and wearing the belt might be left reassembling the belt buckle puzzle with their pants around their ankles. I wouldn't want anyone to experience this malfunction, in public or not. The buckle material doesn't appear durable enough to risk the trust one normally assigns to something holding up their pants!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have worn this belt on most days in the last 14 months and it shows no sign of wear or damage. Pretty impressive for a 100% plastic buckle! The belt can be used with light-weight tools, but I usually switch to a much heavier canvas belt if I am carrying my tool bags. It won't set off the metal detector at the airport, but they may ask you to take it off anyway -- fortunately this is very easy to do.The belt comes with a separate elastic loop that can be used as an extra belt loop if the end of the belt ends up at an inconvenient place. This loop is fairly easy to lose, but I like it enough that I make the extra effort to find it when it slips off.
My fiance goes through work belts every 2-3 months we are almost 6 months in and this belt isn't showing signs of breakage.
